title: Featured Projects
subtitle: A collection of my recent work showcasing my skills and expertise in web development

projects.title: Supreme BARF Canine E-commerce
projects.description: E-commerce specialized in natural dog food, with an intuitive interface, portion calculator, and discount package system. Designed to provide a smooth shopping experience for pet owners.

images.alt: Hero section of the Supreme BARF Canine site showcasing natural dog food
About the Food page displaying the benefits of natural dog products

projects.title: ARKM Suite
projects.description: Centralized project management portal with interactive dashboard, detailed progress tracking through Gantt timelines, and comprehensive deliverables system, optimized to improve communication between teams and clients.

images.alt: ARKM Suite portal login page with modern and secure design
Design system panel showing consistent UI components and documentation
Gantt timeline view showing project stages and dependencies

projects.title: TRVLR
projects.description: Modern travel website with destination search, guides, and blogs. Allows users to explore incredible destinations, plan itineraries, and discover local recommendations with a visually appealing interface.

images.alt: TRVLR main page showcasing international destinations with immersive navigation
Travel itineraries visualization with interactive maps and route planning
Why Travel page with inspirational content and reasons to travel around the world
